forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers before 5pm, then isolated showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. South southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 42. West northwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
